summary: The crew of a submarine is trapped on the sea floor when it sinks. How can they be rescued before they run out of air?
cast: John Mills|Nigel Patrick|Peter Hammond|Andrew Crawford|Michael Brennan|George Cole|Victor Maddern|Roddy McMillan|Frank Coburn|Jack Stewart|James Hayter|Wylie Watson|Richard Attenborough|George Thorpe|Bernard Lee|Kenneth More|Alastair Hunter|Helen Cherry|Lana Morris|Zena Marshall|Arthur Sandifer
keywords: submarine movie|military|soldier|trapped underwater|closing a dead person's eyes
director: Director: Roy Ward Baker (as Roy Baker)
title: Salida al amanecer
